attributes.action: hold a referendum regarding our military presence in the Middle East
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With more than 650,000 civilians dead in Iraq, our government must take responsibility and withdraw it's support to our US ally.

The people, if given a chance, would not wish to vote for yet another illegal occupation and the devastating and inhumane consequences resulting from such an act.

The US has set on a path of escalating confrontation and provocation with Iran – threats of attack (including nuclear attack), arrest of diplomats, economic sanctions. Incidents like this are a consequence of that policy. The answer is de-escalation of tension and commitment to peaceful resolution of disputes and respect for Iranian sovereignty.
